tags.name: ue-details
tags.description:
Details show a brief summary and expand to show additional content..

Events:

  * `ue-show` {} - Emitted when the details opens.

  * `ue-after-show` {} - Emitted after the details opens and all animations are complete.

  * `ue-hide` {} - Emitted when the details closes.

  * `ue-after-hide` {} - Emitted after the details closes and all animations are complete.

Slots:

  * ` ` {} - The details' main content.

  * `summary` {} - The details' summary. Alternatively, you can use the `summary` attribute.

Attributes:

  * `open` {`boolean`} - If the details is open or closed.

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Disables the details so it can’t be toggled.

  * `summary` {`string`} - The summary to show in the header. If you need to display HTML, use the summary slot instead.

Properties:

  * `header` - 

  * `base` - 

  * `open` {`boolean`} - If the details is open or closed.

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Disables the details so it can’t be toggled.

  * `summary` {`string`} - The summary to show in the header. If you need to display HTML, use the summary slot instead.

  * `abortController` - 

  * `styles` -

attributes.name: open
attributes.description:
`open` {`boolean`} - If the details is open or closed.

Property: open

Default: false

Property: disabled

Default: false

attributes.description:

attributes.name: onue-after-show
attributes.description: `ue-after-show` {} - Emitted after the details opens and all animations are complete.

attributes.name: onue-after-hide
attributes.description: `ue-after-hide` {} - Emitted after the details closes and all animations are complete.

tags.name: ue-detailsgroup
tags.description:
Details Groups allow grouping of Details. Setting the `multiple` attribute
allows multiple Details to be open at the same time.

Attributes:

  * `multiple` {`boolean`} - If the details is open or closed.

Properties:

  * `details` - 

  * `multiple` {`boolean`} - If the details is open or closed.

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description:
`multiple` {`boolean`} - If the details is open or closed.

Property: multiple

Default: false
